message_1: Suppose you are given a message consisting of the words "math" and "crypto". Using the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function, find the hash value of the message.
message_2:
To find the hash value of the message "math crypto" using the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function, you can use a programming language or an online tool. I cannot compute the hash directly as I am an AI language model, but I can guide you on how to do it.

Here's an example using Python:

```python
import hashlib

message = "math crypto"
hash_object = hashlib.sha256(message.encode())
hash_value = hash_object.hexdigest()

print("The SHA-256 hash value of the message is:", hash_value)
```

If you run this code, you will get the hash value of the message "math crypto" using the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function. Alternatively, you can use an online SHA-256 hash generator to find the hash value.
